'''Dispenser Double-Pulser'''

 | rd-$+&rarr; | rd-$ | MB | rr-$e1 | rd-$ | rr-$e2 | rd-$ |-
 | input | SB | sp-$u | SB | SB | Di-$s | SB

{{Schematic

 | style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;
 | caption =

'''Subtraction 1-Clock Pulse Multiplier'''

 | input+rd-ew | rs-e | SB | | |-
 | | rd-ne | rd-ew | rd-ew | output+rd-ew

}}
{{Schematic

 | style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;
 | caption =

'''Subtraction N-Clock Pulse Multiplier'''

 | input+rd-ew | rs-e | SB | output+rd-ew |-
 | | rr-n1 | rd-ns | |-
 | | rd-ne | rd-nw |

}}
{{Schematic

 | style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;
 | caption =

'''Torch-Repeater N-Clock Pulse Multiplier'''

 | input+rd-ew | SB | SB | rr-w2 | rt-s | output+rd-ew |-
 | | rt-n! | rd-ew! | rd-ew! | SB |

}}
{{Schematic

 | style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;
 | caption =

'''Dropper-Latch 2-Clock Pulse Multiplier'''

The top dropper contains a single item. The bottom dropper contains a number of items equal to the desired pulse count.

 | input+rd-ew | Dr-s | rd-se | rr-w1 | SB | output+rr-e1 |-
 | | ho-n | rc-e | SB | rd | |-
 | | SB | rc-w! | Dr-e | ho-w |

}}
{{Schematic

 | style = display: inline-block; float: none; vertical-align: text-top;
 | caption =

'''Dropper-Latch 1-Clock Pulse Multiplier'''

The dropper contains a single item. The middle hopper contains one or more items depending on the desired pulse count (the first and last items should be non-stackable items).

 | input+rd-ew | Dr-s | rc-e! | rr-e1! | SB | rt-w | | rd-se | rd-ew | rd-ew | output+rd-ew |-
 | | ho-n | rr-w4! | rc-w! | ho-e | ho-w | SB | rs-e | SB | |

}}
